mapper.insert: insert into agt_comp_info (ID, PINDEX, COM_NO, OFFICE_ID, BUSINESS_LICENSE, ORGANIZATION_CODE, ECHAPTER_PATH, ECHAPTER_ENABLED, IMG1_ID, IMG2_ID, IMG3_ID, NAME, FULL_NAME, S_SPELLING, A_SPELLING, ADDRESS, LEGAL_PERSON, LP_MOBILE, LP_IDCARD, CONTACT_PERSON, CP_MOBILE, CP_IDCARD, ADMIN_ID, TEL, LICENSE_DATE, LOCK_FLAG, COMMISSION_RATE, GRADE, POPULAR, CREATE_USER, CREATE_USER_IDENTITY, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY, MODIFY_TIME, DELETE_FLG, VERSION, INTRODUCTION) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{comNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{officeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{echapterPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{echapterEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{img1Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img2Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img3Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sSpelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aSpelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lpMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lpIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cpIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licenseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lockFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commissionRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{popular,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleteFlg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update agt_comp_info
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PINDEX = #{record.pindex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COM_NO = #{record.comNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OFFICE_ID = #{record.officeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_LICENSE = #{record.businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORGANIZATION_CODE = #{record.organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ECHAPTER_PATH = #{record.echapterPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ECHAPTER_ENABLED = #{record.echapterEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR},
IMG1_ID = #{record.img1Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMG2_ID = #{record.img2Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMG3_ID = #{record.img3Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FULL_NAME = #{record.fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_SPELLING = #{record.sSpelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A_SPELLING = #{record.aSpelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{record.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEGAL_PERSON = #{record.legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LP_MOBILE = #{record.lpMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LP_IDCARD = #{record.lpIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PERSON = #{record.contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CP_MOBILE = #{record.cpMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CP_IDCARD = #{record.cpIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADMIN_ID = #{record.adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{record.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LICENSE_DATE = #{record.licenseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LOCK_FLAG = #{record.lockFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMMISSION_RATE = #{record.commissionRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GRADE = #{record.grade,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POPULAR = #{record.popular,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_USER = #{record.createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_USER_IDENTITY = #{record.createUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_USER = #{record.modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY = #{record.modifyUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETE_FLG = #{record.deleteFlg,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=INTEGER},
INTRODUCTION = #{record.introduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

PINDEX = #{pindex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COM_NO = #{comNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

ECHAPTER_PATH = #{echapterPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ECHAPTER_ENABLED = #{echapterEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR},
IMG1_ID = #{img1Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMG2_ID = #{img2Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMG3_ID = #{img3Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
S_SPELLING = #{sSpelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A_SPELLING = #{aSpelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

LEGAL_PERSON = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LP_MOBILE = #{lpMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update agt_comp_info set PINDEX = #{pindex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COM_NO = #{comNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFICE_ID = #{officeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_LICENSE = #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION_CODE = #{organizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ECHAPTER_PATH = #{echapterPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ECHAPTER_ENABLED = #{echapterEnabled,jdbcType=CHAR}, IMG1_ID = #{img1Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG2_ID = #{img2Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMG3_ID = #{img3Id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, S_SPELLING = #{sSpelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A_SPELLING = #{aSpelling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEGAL_PERSON = #{legalPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LP_MOBILE = #{lpMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LP_IDCARD = #{lpIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_PERSON = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CP_MOBILE = #{cpMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CP_IDCARD = #{cpIdcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADMIN_ID = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LICENSE_DATE = #{licenseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LOCK_FLAG = #{lockFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMMISSION_RATE = #{commissionRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, POPULAR = #{popular,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_USER_IDENTITY = #{createUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_USER_IDENTITY = #{modifyUserIdentity,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_FLG = #{deleteFlg,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT FULL_NAME,NAME,S_SPELLING,A_SPELLING,ID FROM AGT_COMP_INFO WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND (LOCK_FLAG IS NULL OR LOCK_FLAG = 0)
SELECT COUNT(NAME) FROM AGT_COMP_INFO WHERE NAME=#{value}

select COUNT(*) from agt_comp_info a JOIN agt_emp_info b on a.ID = b.COMPANY_ID and b.DELETE_FLG = '0' JOIN hou_house_info d on b.id = d.BEID and d.DELETE_FLG = '0' JOIN hou_lease_info e on d.id = e.HID and e.DELETE_FLG = '0' and e.release_status = '1' where a.office_id = #{id}

select COUNT(*) from agt_comp_info a JOIN agt_emp_info b on a.ID = b.COMPANY_ID and b.DELETE_FLG = '0' JOIN usr_user c on c.id = b.USER_ID and c.DELETE_FLG = '0' where a.office_id = #{id} and b.status = '0'

select COUNT(*) from agt_comp_info a JOIN agt_emp_info b on a.ID = b.COMPANY_ID and b.DELETE_FLG = '0' join con_contract d ON d.BEID = b.ID and d.DELETE_FLG = '0' where a.office_id = #{id} and d.`STATUS` in ('5','6','7','8')
select a.*, b.file_path filePath from agt_comp_info a left join sys_info_att b on a.IMG1_ID = b.id where a.office_id = #{id}
